fields.description:
1. The tgz file containing the setup is attached.
2. Run the following query
select
    sum(if(is_returning=true and is_free=false,1,0)) as unpaid_returning
    from hike_error.ttr_day0;

returns 0 rows with vectorization turned on whereas it return 131 rows with vectorization turned off.

    > ;

OK

fields.summary: sum(if()) returns wrong results with vectorization
